00009 double CodeBook::MatchColorProbabilistic(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00010         // find the codeword that matches the pixel the closest and return the closeness to it
00011         double minDist = 1;
00012         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++) {
00013                 if (color.GetAt(i).age > minAge) {
00014                         double dist = color.GetAt(i).MatchProbabilistic(p, frame, t_cd, alpha, beta, minAge);
00015                         if (dist < minDist)
00016                                 minDist = dist;
00017                 }
00018         }
00019         return minDist;
00020 }
00021 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 bool CodeBook::MatchColor(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00023         // find the codeword that matches the pixel and return true
00024         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++) {
00025                 // minAge should be a new variable in BG dialog box !!!
00026                 if (color.GetAt(i).age > minAge && color.GetAt(i).Match(p, frame, t_cd, alpha, beta, minAge)) {
00027                         return true;
00028                 }
00029         }
00030         // otherwise, return false
00031         return false;
00032 }
00033 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------

00038                         return true;

00042         return false;

00047         for (int i=0;i<imgThermal.GetSize();i++) {

00055 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void CodeBook::UpdateColor(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta) {
00057         // update the codeword that matches the pixel
00058         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++)
00059                 if (color.GetAt(i).Match(p, frame, t_cd, alpha, beta)) {
00060                         color.GetAt(i).Update(p, frame);
00061                         return;
00062                 }
00063         // otherwise, create a new codeword
00064         CodeWordColor c = CodeWordColor(p, frame);
00065         color.Add(c);
00066 }
00067 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 void CodeBook::UpdateThermal(int p, int frame, int m_ThermalMin, int m_ThermalMax) {
00069         // update the codeword that matches the pixel
00070         for (int i=0;i<imgThermal.GetSize();i++)
00071                 if (imgThermal.GetAt(i).MatchByDeviation(p, frame, m_ThermalMin, m_ThermalMax)) {
00072                         imgThermal.GetAt(i).Update(p, frame);
00073                         return;
00074                 }
00075         // otherwise, create a new codeword
00076         CodeWordThermal c = CodeWordThermal(p, frame);
00077         imgThermal.Add(c);
00078 }

00080 int CodeBook::CountOlderThan(int a) {
00081         int mature=0;
00082         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++) {
00083                 if (color.GetAt(i).age > a) 
00084                         mature++;
00085         }
00086         return mature;
00087 
00088 }
00089 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 void CodeBook::RemoveStale(int cutoff) {
00091         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++)
00092                 if (color.GetAt(i).stale > cutoff)
00093                         color.RemoveAt(i);
00094 }
00095 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void CodeBook::GetRGB(Pixel* p) {
00097         p->R = 0; p->G = 0; p->B = 0;
00098         double age = 0, r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;
00099         for (int i=0;i<color.GetSize();i++) {
00100                 CodeWordColor c = (CodeWordColor)color.GetAt(i);
00101                 r += c.R*c.age;
00102                 g += c.G*c.age;
00103                 b += c.B*c.age;
00104                 age += c.age;
00105         }
00106         if (age > 0) {
00107                 p->R = (byte)(r/age); p->G = (byte)(g/age); p->B = (byte)(b/age);
00108         }
00109 }

00112 {
00113         for ( int i = 0; i < nCount; i++, p++ ) {
00114         p->color.Serialize(ar);
